   20: 
   21: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
   22: %%% File: config_static_SUITE
   23: %%%
   24: %%% Description:
   25: %%% Test suite for common_test which tests the get_config and require
   26: %%% functionality
   27: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
   28: -module(config_static_SUITE).
   29: 
   30: -compile(export_all).
   31: 
   32: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   33: 
   34: % The config contains variables:
   35: % x - atom
   36: % gen_cfg - list with two key-values tagged with a and b
   37: % gen_cfg2 - list of five key-values tagged with c, d, e, f and g
   38: % gen_cfg3 - list of two complex key-values taggen with:
   39: %	h: three elements inside - i, j and k
   40: %	l: m inside, contains n and o
   41: 
   42: suite() ->
   43:     [
   44:      {timetrap, {seconds,10}},
   45:      %% x1 doesn't exist in cfg-file!
   46:      {require, x1, x},
   47:      {require, gen_cfg3},
   48:      {require, alias, gen_cfg},
   49:      %% x1 default value
   50:      {default_config, x1, {x,suite}}
   51:     ].
   52: 
   53: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   54:     Config.
   55: 
   56: end_per_suite(_) ->
   57:     ok.
   58: 
   59: all() -> [test_get_config_simple, test_get_config_nested,
   60: 	  test_get_config_deep_nested, test_default_suitewide,
   61: 	  test_config_name_already_in_use1, test_default_tclocal,
   62: 	  test_config_name_already_in_use2, test_alias_tclocal,
   63: 	  test_get_config_undefined,
   64: 	  test_require_subvals,test_require_subvals2,test_require_deep_config,
   65: 	  test_shadow_all,test_element,test_shadow_all_element,
   66: 	  test_internal_deep, test_alias_tclocal_nested,
   67: 	  test_alias_tclocal_nested_backward_compat,
   68: 	  test_alias_tclocal_nested_backward_compat_subvals,
   69: 	  test_config_same_name_already_in_use
   70: ].
   71: 
   72: init_per_testcase(_,Config) ->
   73:     Config.
   74: 
   75: end_per_testcase(test_alias_tclocal_nested_backward_compat, _) ->
   76:     os:putenv("COMMON_TEST_ALIAS_TOP",""),
   77:     ok;
   78: end_per_testcase(_, _) ->
   79:     ok.
   80: 
   81: %% test getting a simple value
   82: test_get_config_simple(_)->
   83:     suite = ct:get_config(x),
   84:     ok.
   85: 
   86: %% test getting a nested value
   87: test_get_config_nested(_)->
   88:     a_value = ct:get_config({gen_cfg, a}),
   89:     ok.
   90: 
   91: %% test getting a deep nested value
   92: test_get_config_deep_nested(_)->
   93:     d_value = ct:get_config({gen_cfg, c, d}),
   94:     ok.
   95: 
   96: %% test suite-wide default value
   97: test_default_suitewide(_)->
   98:     suite = ct:get_config(x1),
   99:     ok.
  100: 
  101: %% should get skipped
  102: test_config_name_already_in_use1() ->
  103:     [{timetrap, {seconds,2}},
  104:      {require, x1, x},
  105:      {x1, {x,test2}}].
  106: test_config_name_already_in_use1(_) ->
  107:     ct:fail("Test should've been skipped, you shouldn't see this!"),
  108:     ok.
  109: 
  110: %% test defaults in a testcase
  111: test_default_tclocal() ->
  112:     [{timetrap, {seconds,3}},
  113:      {require, y1, y},
  114:      {y1, {y,test3}}].
  115: test_default_tclocal(_) ->
  116:     test3 = ct:get_config(y1),
  117:     ok.
  118: 
  119: %% should get skipped
  120: test_config_name_already_in_use2() ->
  121:     [{require,alias,something},
  122:      {alias,{something,'else'}},
  123:      {require, x1, x},
  124:      {x1, {x,test4}}].
  125: test_config_name_already_in_use2(_) ->
  126:     ct:fail("Test should've been skipped, you shouldn't see this!"),
  127:     ok.
  128: 
  129: 
  130: test_config_same_name_already_in_use() ->
  131:     [].
  132: test_config_same_name_already_in_use(_) ->
  133:     ok = ct:require(x2,{gen_cfg,c}),
  134:     ok = ct:require(x2,{gen_cfg,c}).
  135: 
  136: %% test aliases
  137: test_alias_tclocal() ->
  138:     [{require,newalias,gen_cfg}].
  139: test_alias_tclocal(C) when is_list(C) ->
  140:     test_alias_tclocal(newalias);
  141: test_alias_tclocal(Alias) when is_atom(Alias) ->
  142:     A = [{a,a_value},{b,b_value},{c,[{d,d_value}]}] = ct:get_config(Alias),
  143:     A = ct:get_config(gen_cfg),
  144:     B = b_value = ct:get_config({Alias,b}),
  145:     B = ct:get_config({gen_cfg,b}),
  146:     ok.
  147: 
  148: %% test nested aliases
  149: test_alias_tclocal_nested() ->
  150:     [{require,newalias2,{gen_cfg,c}}].
  151: test_alias_tclocal_nested(_) ->
  152:     A = [{d,d_value}] = ct:get_config(newalias2),
  153:     A = ct:get_config({gen_cfg,c}),
  154:     B = d_value = ct:get_config({newalias2,d}),
  155:     B = ct:get_config({gen_cfg,c,d}),
  156:     ok.
  157: 
  158: %% test nested aliases backward compat option
  159: test_alias_tclocal_nested_backward_compat() ->
  160:     os:putenv("COMMON_TEST_ALIAS_TOP","true"),
  161:     [{require,newalias3,{gen_cfg,c}}].
  162: test_alias_tclocal_nested_backward_compat(_) ->
  163:     test_alias_tclocal(newalias3).
  164: 
  165: %% test nested aliases backward compat option
  166: test_alias_tclocal_nested_backward_compat_subvals() ->
  167:     [{require,newalias4,{gen_cfg,[c]}}].
  168: test_alias_tclocal_nested_backward_compat_subvals(_) ->
  169:     test_alias_tclocal(newalias4).
  170: 
  171: %% test for getting undefined variables
  172: test_get_config_undefined(_) ->
  173:     undefined = ct:get_config(y1),
  174:     ok.
  175: 
  176: test_require_subvals() ->
  177:     [{require, {gen_cfg,[a,b,c]}}].
  178: test_require_subvals(_) ->
  179:     ok.
  180: 
  181: test_require_subvals2() ->
  182:     [{require, {gen_cfg,[a,b,c,d]}}].
  183: test_require_subvals2(_) ->
  184:     ct:fail("Test should've been skipped, you shouldn't see this!"),
  185:     ok.
  186: 
  187: test_require_deep_config() ->
  188:     [{require, {gen_cfg3, m, n}}].
  189: test_require_deep_config(_) ->
  190:     ok.
  191: 
  192: 
  193: test_shadow_all(_) ->
  194:     ["n","N"] = ct:get_config({gen_cfg3,l, m, n}, [], [all]).
  195: 
  196: test_element(_) ->
  197:     {{gen_cfg3,l, m, n},"n"} = ct:get_config({gen_cfg3,l, m, n}, [], [element]).
  198: 
  199: test_shadow_all_element(_) ->
  200:     [{{gen_cfg3,l, m, n},"n"},{{gen_cfg3,l, m, n},"N"}] =
  201: 	ct:get_config({gen_cfg3,l, m, n}, [], [all,element]).
  202: 
  203: %% The tests below are needed to verify that things like ct:telnet can use
  204: %% nested configs
  205: test_internal_deep(_) ->
  206:     "n" = ct:get_config({{gen_cfg3,l,m},n}),
  207:     a_value = ct:get_config({{gen_cfg},a}),
  208:     undefined = ct:get_config({{gen_cfg3,l,m},p}).
